pullRequest.title: Introduce a generic EventSink to make it easier for tests to capture specific event types
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Introduce EventSink test util to make it easy for tests to capture specific types of events from the event bus without having to create custom classes.

commit.message: Introduce a generic EventSink to make it easier for tests to capture specific types of events.

nodes.bodyText: Why do you take the eventType as an argument to this class? You already take it in the constructor.
